code:
%% Tombstone timeline and shadowing
%% Alt: Timeline of writes, tombstones, TTL expiry across generations
%% Caption: Newer writes can shadow older tombstones; TTLs expire visibility over time
sequenceDiagram
  participant W1 as Write v=42, t=1000
  participant T1 as RowTombstone t=2000
  participant W2 as Write v=new, t=3000
  participant TTL as TTL Expiry

  Note over W1: value 42 visible until T1
  T1->>W1: Deletes older value(Infra_LoadBalancer)
  Note over W2: newer value writes after T1
  TTL-->>W2: Optional expiry at t=write+ttl
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
